content: Working together with Mr. Yoshida, the Sony Group's management team, and our employees around the world, I intend to continue to develop through my efforts to the further evolution growth of our business based upon our purpose. Thank you for your question. Thank you for your question. Thank you very much. Thank you for your question. Thank you very much. Sony Life's new policy amount in force increased 57% year-in-year due to growth in our corporate business, and strong sales, mainly of the new individual variable annuity , there's no change in the previous forecast. Thank you very much. Thank you for your question. Thank you for your question. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you for your question.
